long_description: The handy, pocket-size Leatherman Sidekick multitool has a wide range of the tools you need to get your project done, at a fraction of the cost of other tools. 420HC stainless-steel blades are accessible from the outside and can be opened easily with one hand. Rounded handles offer a sure and comfortable grip; spring-action jaws make using the pliers a breeze. Features straight and serrated blades; medium, small and Phillips screwdrivers, bottle and can openers and a 1-in. ruler. Also includes spring-loaded regular and needlenose pliers, spring-loaded wire cutters, wire stripper, metal file, fixed lanyard ring and removable pocket clip. The Leatherman Sidekick multitool comes with a leather sleeve and convenient carabiner accessory (not intended for climbing).
short_description: The handy, pocket-size Leatherman Sidekick multitool has a wide range of the tools you need to get your project done, at a fraction of the cost of other tools.
